title: Paartha Mudhal Naale Song Lyrics Vettaiyaadu Vilaiyaadu
stanzas:
Paartha Mudhal Naale Song Lyrics Vettaiyaadu Vilaiyaadu
#HarrishJayaraj #BomabyJayashree #Thamarai

Paartha mudhal naale
unnai
paartha mudhal naale
katchi pilai pole
unardhaen
katchi pilai pole

or alaiyaai vandhe
nee enai adithaai.
kadalaai maari pin
enai iluthaai.

en padhaagai
thaangiya unmugam
unmugam endrum
maraiyaadhe

kaatti kodukkiradhe
kanne
kaatti kodukkiradhe

kadhal valigiradhe
kannil
kadhal valigiradhe

un vizhiyil vazhiyum
piriyangalai
paarthe kadanthen
pagal iravai

un alaadhi anbinil
nanaindhapin
nanaindhapin naanum
mazhaiyaanen

kaalai ezhundhadhum
en kangal mudhalil
thaedi pidipadhun mugame

thookkam varugayil
kanpaarkkum kadaisi
katchikkul nirpadhum
un mugame

enai pattri enake
theriyaadha palavum
nee arindhu nadappadhai
viyappaen

unai yaedhum kaetkaamal
unadhaasai anaithum
niraivetra vendum endru
thavippen

pogindren ena nee
palanooru muraigal
vidai petrum pogaamal
iruppaai

sari endru sari endru
unai pogach cholli
kadhavoram naanum
nirkka sirippaai
kadhavoram naanum
nirkka sirippaai

kaatti kodukkiradhe
kanne
kaatti kodukkiradhe

kadhal valigiradhe
kannil
kadhal valigiradhe

or alaiyaai vandhe
nee enai adithaai.
kadalaai maari pin
enai iluthaai.

un alaadhi anbinil
nanaindhapin
nanaindhapin naanum
mazhaiyaanen

unnai marandhu nee
thookkathil sirithaai
thoongaamal adhai
kandu sirithen

thookkam marandhu naan
unai kaanum katchi
kanavaaga vandhathendru
ninaithaen

yaarum maanidare
illaadha idathil
siru veedu kattikola
thondrum

nee naanum angae
vazhkindra vazhvai
maramthorum sedhukkida
vendum

kan paarthu kadhaikka
mudiyaamal naanum
thavikkindra oru
pennum neethaan

kankotta mudiyaamal
mudiyaamal paarthum
salikkaadha oru
pennum neethaan
salikkaadha oru
pennum neethaan

Paartha mudhal naale
unnai
paartha mudhal naale
katchi pilai pole
unardhaen
katchi pilai pole

or alaiyaai vandhe
nee enai adithaai.
kadalaai maari pin
enai iluthaai.

en padhaagai
thaangiya unmugam
unmugam endrum
maraiyaadhe
